name: Upgrade Crusade
description:
After much work, Upgrade Crusade is finally finished! 

This is my first Unity game and my goal was to make an action filled 2D shooter game that you could also just sit back and play. It's a quick playthrough that I hope you will enjoy!

Main Keybinds:

MovementWASDDashingShift | Left Ctrl GrappleSpace | Right Mouse

Other important notes:

  • You can scroll out in the skill tree
  • You can change the dash type in options (directional or to mouse)
  • You can reset your game data in the options menu
